problems.title: Find K-Length Substrings With No Repeated Characters (Sliding Window)
problems.description:
Given a string s and an integer k, return the number of substrings in s of length k with no repeated characters.

Input Format:
First line: string s.
Second line: integer k.

Output Format:
Print a single integer: the count of valid substrings.
hintsList: Think about how to use a sliding window to optimize the solution.
Consider using a frequency map or two pointers to track the window state.
